snippet: The I.M.F. needs to rethink the present, not just the past.
abstract: Editorial calls on International Monetary Fund to learn from past mistakes and show new flexibility as it reviews Greek compliance in preparation for releasing new $4 billion bailout installment; offers several examples of counterproductive conditions that should be altered in order to foster legitimate growth.
lead_paragraph: The I.M.F. needs to rethink the present, not just the past.

headline.main: A Chance to Do Better on Greece
headline.print_headline: A Chance to Do Better on Greece
